definitions.definition: To determine , estimate or judge the value of; to evaluate ; to estimate.
To impose or charge , especially as punishment for an infraction .
examples: The referee assessed a penalty for delaying the game.
A $10.00 late fee will be assessed on all overdue accounts.

definitions.definition: To calculate and demand (the tax money due) from a person or entity .
examples: Once you've submitted a tax return, the Tax Department will assess the amount of tax you still owe.

main_definition: ( transitive ) To determine , estimate or judge the value of; to evaluate ; to estimate.
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To impose or charge , especially as punishment for an infraction .
( transitive ) To calculate and demand (the tax money due) from a person or entity .
